Summary SENIOR MARKETING LEADER active in the IT INDUSTRY. 
 
Big fan of Conscious Leadership, simplicity, common sense and a pragmatic approach to create a win-win situation. Marketing is about "Help" not "Hype". 
 
Passionate about High Performing Teams, coaching for impact and sharing knowledge to everyone listening. 
 
Leader and decision maker based on analytical skills with a lot of common sense, organizational talent and proven management skills. Extensive experience in combining vision, strategy and execution orchestration to meet agreed objectives; this includes leading (mostly remote) teams, developing and executing on business plans, accountability and responsibility for marketing campaigns, big events (10,000 attendees) and budget responsibilities ($20 Mio). 
 
People describe me as a listener, insightful, positive, doing the right thing, seeing the bigger picture, committed and people oriented 
 
Core Competencies include: 
- Team Building, Conscious Leadership and Coaching 
- Revenue Marketing 
- Connection between Sales and Marketing 
- Campaign Strategy 
- Event Strategy and Program Management (C-level and large scale events) 
- Business Strategy and Operations 
- Content Marketing 
- Brand Management 
- PR and Communications 
- Budget and Fiscal Accountability 
- Accomplished Presenter 
 
Currently working at Cisco Systems as the Marketing Lead for Northern Europe (20 people) and the Head of Event Marketing for Europe, Middle East and Africa (5 people and agencies). Member of the Senior Leadership Team for Cisco Northern Europe and member of the Marketing Leadership Team for EMEA.

Summary I am passionate about marketing, customer journeys and customer experience. I believe that every employee is a marketer regardless of the department they work in. Anyone that comes into contact with a customer or anything that has a customer touch point is in the business of marketing. I enjoy empowering my colleagues to be fearless marketers and encourage all marketing to be human.  
 
As the world becomes digitised, consumers have a louder voice and have more purchasing muscle. With so many brands competing for consumer’s attention, I want to ensure that my brand delivers a personalised message to the right customer at the right time. It’s this human and personalised experience that attracts and retains consumers. 
 
With over 15 years of strategic and hands on experience as an international communications and marketing manager, I’ve supported complex and fast moving organisations. I'm a strong communicator and influencer and a bold and dynamic team player. I enjoy working collaboratively across the business with internal stakeholders and engaging with employees of all levels. Digital disruption and the Internet of Things has forced marketing to evolve. I am a fearless marketing leader and am passionate about the future of marketing which I believe is personalised customer journeys and marketing in ‘real-time’. 
 
Key Skills: 
 
•	International communication and marketing  
•	Strong negotiator and influencer. 
•	Program management. 
•	Awareness, demand and lead generation experience including digital, live & online events, email, direct mail, partner, channel and SP marketing. 
•	Developing content, communications, and audience acquisition strategies for audience led marketing. 
•	Customer Advocacy Programs 
•	Agency/vendor selection and management.  
•	Marketing Collateral Development.  
•	Partner management and relationship development. 
•	C-Level and employee engagement via written and verbal communications.  
•	Budget Planning.
